channel.title: CVE Feed for Digi International -- Digi RealPort

item.title: CVE-2023-4299|2024-08-02T07:24:04.616Z -- digi%20international -- digi%20realport
item.description: Digi RealPort Protocol is vulnerable to a replay attack that may allow an attacker to bypass authentication to access connected equipment.
